site.name: 2FA Code Generator
site.title: 2FA Code Generator - Free & Secure TOTP Generator
site.description: Free, secure, client-side two-factor authentication (2FA) code generator using TOTP. Enter your Base32 secret key to generate secure codes instantly. 100% private and never sent to a server.
site.keywords: 2FA, two-factor authentication, TOTP, authenticator, OTP, one-time password, Base32, RFC 6238, secure 2FA generator, Google Authenticator alternative, free authenticator, client-side 2FA

home.headline: 2FA Code Generator (Free)
home.subheadline: Generate secure 2FA codes instantly using your Base32 secret key. A private, free, browser-based 2FA/TOTP generator compatible with Google Authenticator and Authy.
home.footerSecurity: Your secret stays in your browser—never uploaded or stored.
home.aboutText: This free online 2FA (two-factor authentication) code generator uses the TOTP (Time-Based One-Time Password) standard. It works with Google Authenticator, Authy, Microsoft Authenticator, and all TOTP-based authentication systems.
home.feature1: Fully client-side — no data sent to servers
home.howText: Paste your Base32-encoded secret key from any service that uses 2FA. The generator creates a secure 6-digit TOTP code based on HMAC-SHA1 and the current Unix timestamp—just like standard authenticator apps.

webapp.name: 2FA Code Generator (TOTP)
webapp.description: Generate 2FA authentication codes online using the TOTP method and your Base32 secret key. No data is stored or sent. Secure, private, and fully browser-based.

q1.question: What is 2FA?
q1.answer: 2FA (two-factor authentication) adds an extra layer of security by requiring both your password and a temporary 6-digit code. Most services use the TOTP standard to generate these codes.

q2.question: Is this 2FA code generator secure?
q2.answer: Yes. The generator is 100% client-side, so your Base32 secret key never leaves your device. No information is sent to a server, and the TOTP algorithm follows the industry-standard RFC 6238.

q3.question: How do I generate 2FA codes online?
q3.answer: Paste your Base32 secret key into the generator. A 6-digit TOTP-based 2FA code will appear instantly and refresh every 30 seconds—just like Google Authenticator.

q4.question: What is a Base32 secret key?
q4.answer: A Base32 secret key is provided when you enable 2FA on an account. It uses letters A–Z and digits 2–7 and is used to generate TOTP-based authentication codes.

totp.secretHint: Use only A–Z and 2–7. Spaces are ignored.
totp.invalidBase32: Invalid Base32 secret. Use only A–Z and 2–7.
totp.generateError: Failed to generate code. Check your secret.
totp.enterSecretSr: Enter a secret to generate a 2FA code
